sentences.en: We found a man nosing around in our backyard.
sentences.cn: 我们发现有个人在我们后院里找什么东西。

sentences.en: He had an assemblage of old junk cars filling the backyard.
sentences.cn: 他曾经在后院堆满了废旧汽车。

sentences.en: The kids were playing leapfrog and doing somersaults in the backyard.
sentences.cn: 孩子们正在后院玩跳背游戏和翻筋头。
